# Chat Pruner - Update v13.2.1.0 (2026-01-04)

(Use the same image as the original Chat Pruner post.)

Hey everyone â€” quick update for Chat Pruner.

This version adds integration with the OverEngineeredVTT Suite Monitor and bumps the minimum Foundry VTT requirement to v13. If you're still on v11 or v12, continue using v13.2.0.0.

## What you'll notice

- **New Dependency**: Now integrates with OverEngineeredVTT Suite Monitor for centralized module management
- **V13+ Required**: Minimum Foundry VTT version is now v13 (v11/v12 users should stay on v13.2.0.0)

## Compatibility

- Foundry VTT: v13+
- System compatibility: Universal
- **For v11/v12 users**: Use v13.2.0.0 manifest: https://github.com/paulcheeba/chat-pruner/releases/download/v13.2.0.0/module.json

## Latest Release / Manifest

https://github.com/paulcheeba/chat-pruner/releases/latest/download/module.json

If you run into anything weird, drop feedback in the Discord channel and I'll take a look.
